resources.string:
Amarok %s

 [Developer] @Deltazefiro

 [Info] Amarok: A simple android app for private file- and app-hiding.

 [Repo] https://github.com/deltazefiro/Amarok-Hider

 Copyright © 2022–2023 DeltaZero, Licensed Apache 2.0
This setting is only available after unhiding
Grant Amarok access to external storage to hide files.
Storage permission denied. File-hiding is unavailable
App-hiding unavailable. Check \"More Settings\" → \"Switch app-hiding mode\".
Hunting alone in the starless night.
Send anonymous crash reports to the developers for analysis.
Restart the app to apply the new changes.
Shows info to help fix problems.
DSM: Invalid DSM provider. Have you installed and activated the DSM provider on your device?
Could not hide app: DSM provider not active.

Hints for folder selector: 
	 1. Click "Use This Folder" to select the folder
	 2. Always select a file on the device 
	(Slide from the right of the screen to open local files)
Please ensure it is local file and not a virtual one.
Please select app-hiding mode in \"More settings\".
Check for new Amarok versions when opening the app.
Amarok %s (%d) is available to download and install.
You are running the latest version.
Caution: Ensure the what you select manually actually exists, as this is not validated.
Unsupported Shizuku version: Pre-v11. Please install Shizuku v11 or later.
Shizuku: Service unavailable. Have you installed Shizuku/Shu on your device?
Could not hide app: Could not access IPackageManager API.
App-hiding with root access.\nRecommended if your device is rooted, but lacks the Xposed framework. Root permission is required.
App-hiding with Shizuku (or Sui). \nRecommended if your device runs Android 11+ or has the Xposed framework. Installed and active Shizuku or Sui required.\n

App-hiding with Delegated-Scopes-Manager.\nNot recommended unless your device runs Android 10 or earlier and is not rooted. May be buggy and work unexpectedly. Installed Icebox (or StopAPP) set as device owner required.
Make the filename human-unreadable. The basic feature of file-hiding. Can not be turned off.
Obfuscate the file signature in the file header to make the file \"corrupted\". Prevents the file from being opened by \"Open With\" manually, but may slow down the file-hiding process.
Experimental feature. Obfuscating file headers have no effect on text files. Enabling this function will fully obfuscate text files. It will slow down the hiding process to some extent.
Not recommended. An enhanced version of \"Fully obfuscate text files\". Utilize this option only if the standard method proves ineffective. Slows down the hiding process dramatically.
Permission to display over other apps denied.
Permission to spawn pop-up windows required
Floating button needs permission to spawn pop-up windows. Please find Amarok in the settings menu and grant it.
Display an floating button used to hide apps & files in emergency. It is shown over all other apps. The button only shows in unhidden state.
New version available, but failed to fetch. Please update manually.
Could not open the system file picker
Oops! Your system does not have a default filemanager. Please long-press the \"Add hidden folder\" button and input the path manually.
Show a permanent notification to notify users when not hidden.
QuickHide service need notification permission to work.
Your privacy is not hidden. Click to hide.
